entry.tran: （会导致世界或人类毁灭的）大决战；善恶大决战
entry.def: Armageddon is a terrible battle or war that some people think will lead to the total destruction of the world or the human race.

means.word_mean: 1. (New Testament) the scene of the final battle between the kings of the Earth at the end of the world

sentences.sentence: "they called the first World War an Armageddon"

auth_sentence.content: But I certainly don't want to deliberately move armageddon up to the present because it may happen some time in the future.
